official_title: A bill to deauthorize the O'Neill Unit of the Missouri River Basin project in Nebraska, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to deauthorize the O'Neill Unit of the Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin Program. Rescinds the repayment contracts between the United States and the North Central Nebraska Reclamation District and the Niorara Basin Irrigation District.

titles.title: A bill to deauthorize the O'Neill Unit of the Missouri River Basin project in Nebraska, and for other purposes.
